# AuraSyntax Website Information for LLMs

# About AuraSyntax
AuraSyntax is a leading software development company specializing in comprehensive digital solutions. We blend creative aura with structured syntax to craft AI-driven web and cloud solutions that power what's next.

# Services
- Web Development: Custom web applications using React, Node.js, and modern frameworks
- Mobile Development: Native iOS and Android apps, plus cross-platform solutions
- AI & Machine Learning: Predictive analytics, NLP, computer vision, and deep learning
- Blockchain: Smart contracts, DApps, NFT marketplaces, Web3 applications
- Cloud & DevOps: AWS, Azure, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes
- UI/UX Design: User-centered design, wireframing, prototyping
- E-commerce: Online stores, payment gateways, inventory management
- System Integration: API development, third-party integrations
- IT Consulting: Technology strategy, architecture review, digital transformation
- Data Analytics: Data visualization, business intelligence, predictive analytics
- Quality Assurance: Manual and automated testing, performance testing
- Cybersecurity: Network security, vulnerability assessments, incident response

# Contact
Website: https://www.aurasyntax.com
Email: Available through contact form on website

# Technologies
React, Node.js, AWS, Docker, Kubernetes, AI/ML, Blockchain, Cloud Computing
